name: Margaret Atwood
bio: Canadian author known for her poetry and dystopian fiction.

name: Neil Gaiman
bio: British author of fantasy, comic books, and short fiction.

name: Yuval Noah Harari
bio: Israeli historian and philosopher, professor at Hebrew University.

name: Agatha Christie
bio: British mystery writer, the best-selling novelist of all time.

name: Maya Angelou
bio: American poet, memoirist, and civil rights activist.

name: Brandon Sanderson
bio: American fantasy and science fiction author known for complex magic systems.

name: J.K. Rowling
bio: British author best known for the Harry Potter series.

name: Stephen King
bio: American author of horror, supernatural fiction, and suspense.

name: David McCullough
bio: American historian and author, winner of multiple Pulitzer Prizes.

name: Roald Dahl
bio: British novelist known for children's books and short stories.
